迫真: (はくしん) - reality; true to life
迯がす: (にがす) - to miss; to lose; to give away; to let go; to set free; to let get away
迯げる: (にげる) - to escape; to run away
述べ合う: (のべあう) - to compare (e.g notes); to exchange (e.g. views, opinions)
述べ立てる: (のべたてる) - to relate at great length; to dwell eloquently (on)
述作: (じゅっさく) - writing a book; literary work
述語動詞: (じゅつごどうし) - predicate verb; predicator
述語名詞: (じゅつごめいし) - predicate noun; predicate nominative
述語形容詞: (じゅつごけいようし) - predicate adjective
述語論理: (じゅつごろんり) - predicate logic; predicate calculus
迷い: (mayoi) - hesitação, perplexidade, confusão, dúvida, indecisão; ilusão, engano, hesitação, perplexidade, confusão, dúvida, indecisão; ilusão, engano; incapacidade de alcançar a iluminação
迷い箸: (まよいばし) - hovering one's chopsticks back and forth over side dishes, when trying to choose which one to take (a breach of etiquette)
迷い込む: (まよいこむ) - to go astray; to lose one's way
迷う: (mayou) - perder o caminho; vacilar, hesitar, ficar em dúvida, ficar confuso, ficar perplexo; ceder à tentação, perder o controle de si mesmo; ser encantado, estar apaixonado, estar cativado, estar arrebatado
迷わす: (まよわす) - to puzzle; perplex; bewilder; delude; mislead; fascinate
迷コンビ: (めいコンビ) - (joc) (pun on 名コンビ)  odd but funny two-man team
迷作: (めいさく) - (joc) (pun on 名作)  odd but somehow interesting work of art
迷子: (まいご) - lost child; lost person; stray child; missing child
迷子になる: (まいごになる) - to get lost; to become lost; to go astray
迷子センター: (まいごセンター) - lost child department; place to bring lost children to
迷子犬: (まいごいぬ) - lost dog; missing dog
迷子郵便: (まいごゆうびん) - lost mail; undeliverable mail
迷宮入り: (めいきゅういり) - going unsolved; unanswered; unresolved; deadend
迷惑: (meiwaku) - problema, incômodo, aborrecimento, chateação, inconveniência; estar incomodado (por), ser perturbado (por), ser prejudicado (por)
迷惑の受け身: (めいわくのうけみ) - suffering passive
迷惑の受身: (めいわくのうけみ) - suffering passive
迷惑をかける: (めいわくをかける) - to cause trouble (for someone); to annoy; to bother; to inconvenience
迷惑を掛ける: (めいわくをかける) - to cause trouble (for someone); to annoy; to bother; to inconvenience
迷惑メール: (めいわくメール) - spam; unsolicited email
迷惑千万: (めいわくせんばん) - (yoji) great nuisance; extremely annoying; quite embarrassing
迷惑至極: (めいわくしごく) - (yoji) great nuisance; extremely annoying; quite embarrassing
迷惑防止条例: (めいわくぼうしじょうれい) - {law} anti-nuisance ordinance; ordinance against disturbing the peace
迷惑電話: (めいわくでんわ) - nuisance phone call; spam phone call
迷探偵: (めいたんてい) - (joc) (pun on 名探偵)  inept detective
迷曲: (めいきょく) - (joc) (pun on 名曲)  odd but interesting song
迷案: (めいあん) - (joc) (pun on 名案)  seemingly good but ultimately stupid idea
迷演: (めいえん) - (joc) (pun on 名演) dumbfounding performance; queer act; performance so bad it's spellbinding
迷演技: (めいえんぎ) - (joc) (pun on 名演技)  dumbfounding performance; queer act
迷界: (めいかい) - world of the lost; human world; this world
迷答: (めいとう) - ridiculous answer; absurd response; boner
迷言: (めいげん) - (joc) (pun on 名言)  meaningless or stupid turn of phrase that yet somewhat sounds like a wise saying
迷訳: (めいやく) - confused translation; puzzling translation
迷説: (めいせつ) - (joc) (pun on 名説)  misdirected claim; incomprehensible idea
迷論: (めいろん) - fallacious argument; fallacy; absurd opinion
迷走: (めいそう) - straying; wandering off course
迷走台風: (めいそうたいふう) - stray typhoon (i.e. one with an irregular path)
迷走神経: (めいそうしんけい) - vagus nerve
迸しり出る: (ほとばしりでる) - to gush out; to gush forth; to effuse
迸り: (ほとばしり) - gusher; spout; outpouring; effusion; torrent
迸る: (とばしる) - to surge; to well up; to gush out
迹門: (しゃくもん) - first half of the Lotus Sutra, in which the Buddha appears as a spatiotemporally restricted being
追々: (おいおい) - gradually; by degrees; little by little; step by step
追いかけっこ: (おいかけっこ) - chasing one another; playing tag
追いかける: (おいかける) - to chase; to run after; to pursue
追いこす: (おいこす) - to pass (e.g. car)/to overtake; to surpass/to outstrip/to get ahead of/to outdistance
追いすがる: (おいすがる) - to be hot on a person's heels
追いたてる: (おいたてる) - to drive on/to urge forward (e.g. cattle)/to rouse (game from its cover)/to shoo away; to press a tenant to leave/to evict
追いつき追い越せ: (おいつきおいこせ) - catch up with and overtake; pass after catching up with
追いつく: (おいつく) - to overtake; to catch up (with)
追いつめる: (おいつめる) - to corner; to drive to the wall; to run down; to track down; to chase after
追いつ追われつ: (おいつおわれつ) - cat-and-mouse (race); lead changing hands many times
追いまくる: (おいまくる) - to disperse/to chase away; (usu. in the passive, as ～に追いまくられる) to pursue relentlessly/to be in hot pursuit
追いまわす: (おいまわす) - to chase about; to hang on; to drive hard
追いやる: (おいやる) - to drive away/to order off/to chase away; to force into an unpleasant situation (bankruptcy, prostitution, suicide, etc.)
追いコン: (おいコン) - farewell party; send-off party
追い上げる: (おいあげる) - to gain on; to put pressure on
追い付く: (おいつく) - to overtake; to catch up (with)
追い出し: (おいだし) - expulsion/dismissal/ejection/eviction; drum beat at the end of a day's performance (in the theatre, sumo, etc.)
追い出しコンパ: (おいだしコンパ) - farewell party; send-off party
追い出し屋: (おいだしや) - people or companies that forcefully and illegally expel defaulting tenants from their lodgings
追い出し部屋: (おいだしべや) - expulsion room; banishment room; rooms where employees who cannot be fired are sent
追い出す: (おいだす) - to expel; to drive out
